parameters.name: PFace1
parameters.description: Pointer to the first IFace2 object

parameters.name: PFace2
parameters.description: Pointer to the second IFace2 object

title: IGussetFeatureData.SetSupportingFaces
description: Sets the two, adjacent, supporting faces for this gusset feature.
signature:
System.Boolean SetSupportingFaces( 
   Face2
PFace1
,
   Face2
PFace2
)

parameters.name: PFace1
parameters.description: Pointer to the first IFace2 object

parameters.name: PFace2
parameters.description: Pointer to the second IFace2 object

returns: True if the supporting faces are set, false if not
